title: How to Make a Blue Lagoon Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill the highball glass about 3/4 full with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the vodka and blue Curaçao into the highball glass.
Top the drink off with the lemonade.
Use your long stirrer and stir everything well.
Plop the cherry in the drink and wedge the orange slice on the side of the glass as a garnish.

tyn: Long handled bar spoon or stirrer
